title: 3 Simple Ways to Cancel Your Google One Membership

steps.title: Open Google One.
steps.content: Open Google One. The app icon looks like a multicolored "1" that you'll find on one of your Home screens, in the app drawer, or by searching.

steps.title: Tap the Settings tab.
steps.content: Tap the Settings tab. You'll see this at the top of your screen with Home , Storage , and Support .

steps.title: Tap Cancel membership.
steps.content: Tap Cancel membership . Tap Cancel membership again to confirm the action. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Open Google One.
steps.content: Open Google One. The app icon looks like a multicolored "1" that you'll find on one of your Home screens.

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . This three-line menu icon is in the top left corner of your screen.

steps.title: Tap Membership plan.
steps.content: Tap Membership plan . It's usually near the top of the menu.

steps.title: Tap Manage plan.
steps.content: Tap Manage plan . You'll find this near the bottom of the menu or next to your plan details.

steps.title: Tap Cancel membership.
steps.content: Tap Cancel membership . This is at the bottom of the menu.

steps.title: Tap Cancel your Google One membership.
steps.content: Tap Cancel your Google One membership . This option will allow you to use Apple services to cancel your membership by yourself. If you need assistance, tap Phone, Chat, or Email .

steps.title: Follow the on-screen instructions to cancel your account.
steps.content: Follow the on-screen instructions to cancel your account. If you're using Apple services to cancel your Google One membership, you'll need to enter your Apple ID and password to continue and an email will be sent to your account confirming that your subscription has been cancelled. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Go to https://families.google.com/ and sign in (if prompted).
steps.content: Go to https://families.google.com/ and sign in (if prompted). You can use a mobile or desktop web browser to cancel your membership.

steps.title: Click or tap Settings.
steps.content: Click or tap Settings . It's in the menu on the left side of the window and is next to an icon of a gear.

steps.title: Click or tap Cancel Membership.
steps.content: Click or tap Cancel Membership . It's at the bottom of the page and an email will be sent to your account confirming that your subscription has cancelled.
